subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: John Obi Mikel and Yakubu Aiyegbeni scored to lead Nigeria over Benin, 2-0, on Tuesday in Sekondi, Ghana, and into the quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations. Ivory Coast (3-0), which already was assured of advancing, defeated Mali, 3-0. Ivory Coast won Group B and will play the Group A runner-up, Guinea, on Sunday. Nigeria (1-1-1) will meet host Ghana.
